Package a2

Class CanvasPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • a2.CanvasPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ComponentListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    public class CanvasPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.ComponentListener

    Canvas Panel Class

    This class draws scalable with resize shapes on a square JPanel and records these shapes based on tool selected and mouse clicks, presses and releases when on the panel.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Melanie Howard
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.awt.Color colour
      RGB pen colour set with colour chooser.
      private java.awt.Point endPoint
      end Point of drawn shape set when mouse released.
      private java.awt.Color fill
      RGB fill colour set with colour chooser.
      private double h
      the height of the panel set on resize.
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Point> list
      an arrayList of Points added to when clicking to draw polygon
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList> listOfDrawableShapes
      the arrayList of Lists of shapes with co-ordinates in panel Point format, created before painting from ListOfShapes dependant on canvas dimensions stored on resize.
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList> listOfShapes
      the arrayList of Lists of shapes with co-ordinates in VEC format, added to when shape is added (drawn).
      private java.awt.Point pointEnd
      the end Point set as mouse is dragged and moved, used to continuously draw line.
      private java.awt.Point pointStart
      the start Point set on mouse press used to continuously draw line when clicking and dragging.
      private java.awt.Point startPoint
      start Point of drawn shape set when mouse pressed or clicked.
      private Draw tool
      instance of Draw set when toolButton selected.
      private double w
      the width of the panel set on resize.

    • Method Detail

      • getPreferredSize

        public java.awt.Dimension getPreferredSize()
        this method overrides the PreferredSize of the panel, ensuring that the panel is always square depending on the dimensions of it's container panel.
        Overrides:
        getPreferredSize in class javax.swing.JComponent
        Returns:
        new square dimensions of the panel

      • paintComponent

        public void paintComponent​(java.awt.Graphics g)
        this method overrides the paintComponent method to paint on the panel, firstly a line that updates as the user clicks and drags using line tool. translates the VEC coordinates in each command in ListOfShapes into Point co-ordinates that can be used to draw on the panel. Than calls the relevant ShapeDraw method for each command.
        Overrides:
        paintComponent in class javax.swing.JComponent
        Parameters:
        g - Java swing graphics.

      • translateXToVecFormat

        private double translateXToVecFormat​(java.awt.Point point)
        This method translates the x co-ordinate of a point into VEC 0.0 to 1.0 format based on the current dimensions of the panel, when the point is recorded.
        Parameters:
        point - a Point on the canvas.
        Returns:
        Double x co-ordinate of that point in VEC format.

      • translateYToVecFormat

        private double translateYToVecFormat​(java.awt.Point point)
        This method translates the y co-ordinate of a point into VEC 0.0 to 1.0 format based on the current dimensions of the panel, when the point is recorded.
        Parameters:
        point - a Point on the canvas.
        Returns:
        Double y co-ordinate of that point in VEC format.

      • translateToDrawableFormat

        private java.awt.Point translateToDrawableFormat​(double xcoord,
                                                 double ycoord)
        This method translates a pair of x and y co-ordinates in VEC format to the requisite Point on the panel depending on the panels current dimensions.
        Parameters:
        xcoord - double x co-ordinate in VEC format.
        ycoord - double y co-ordinate in VEC format.
        Returns:
        Point on the panel corresponding to the two params.
